description: This file defines the IconButton component, a reusable, themed icon button with various interaction states and customizable properties, implemented using LightningJS framework.

classes.name: IconButton
classes.description: A reusable, themed icon button component with hover, focus, active, and disabled states, built using LightningJS.

methods.name: _template()
methods.description: Defines the visual template of the IconButton component, including layout, styles, and child elements.

methods.name: _construct()
methods.description: Initializes default property values and internal state variables.

methods.name: props
methods.description: Getter and setter for the component properties, enabling external configuration and re-rendering.

methods.name: _applyProps()
methods.description: Applies the current properties to update the component's appearance and behavior.

methods.name: _focus()
methods.description: Handles focus event, showing focus ring and applying related styles.

methods.name: _unfocus()
methods.description: Handles blur event, hiding focus ring and updating styles.

methods.name: _handleEnter()
methods.description: Handles the Enter key or click event, triggering onClick callback if defined.

methods.name: _handleClick()
methods.description: Handles click events, invoking the same logic as _handleEnter.

methods.name: _handleMouseEnter()
methods.description: Handles mouse enter events to update hover state.

methods.name: _handleMouseLeave()
methods.description: Handles mouse leave events to reset hover and pressed states.

methods.name: _handleMouseDown()
methods.description: Handles mouse button press to update pressed state.

methods.name: _handleMouseUp()
methods.description: Handles mouse button release to reset pressed state.
